verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַת־ <WH8141> year שֶׁ֤בַע <WH7651> In the seventh לְיֵהוּא֙ <WH3058> of Jehu מָלַ֣ךְ <WH4427> began to reign יְהוֹאָ֔שׁ <WH3060> Jehoash וְאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> and forty שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> reigned בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> he in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> And his mother's צִבְיָ֖ה <WH6645> [was] Zibiah מִבְּאֵ֥ר שָֽׁבַע׃ <WH884> of Beersheba

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <WH6213> did יְהוֹאָ֧שׁ <WH3060> And Jehoash הַיָּשָׁ֛ר <WH3477> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all יָמָ֑יו <WH3117> all his days אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הוֹרָ֔הוּ <WH3384> instructed יְהוֹיָדָ֖ע <WH3077> wherein Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> the priest

רַ֥ק <WH7535> but הַבָּמ֖וֹת <WH1116> But the high places לֹא־ <WH3808> were not סָ֑רוּ <WH5493> were not taken away ע֥וֹד <WH5750> still הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> the people מְזַבְּחִ֥ים <WH2076> still sacrificed וּֽמְקַטְּרִ֖ים <WH6999> and burnt incense בַּבָּמֽוֹת׃ <WH1116> in the high places

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹאָ֜שׁ <WH3060> And Jehoash אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <WH3548> to the priests כֹּל֩ <WH3605> All כֶּ֨סֶף <WH3701> All the money הַקֳּדָשִׁ֜ים <WH6944> of the dedicated things אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יוּבָ֤א <WH935> that is brought בֵית־ <WH1004> into the house יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> [even] the money עוֹבֵ֔ר <WH5674> that passeth אִ֕ישׁ <WH376> of every one כֶּ֥סֶף <WH3701> [the account] the money נַפְשׁ֖וֹת <WH5315> that every man עֶרְכּ֑וֹ <WH6187> is set at כָּל־ <WH3605> all כֶּ֗סֶף <WH3701> [and] all the money אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which יַֽעֲלֶה֙ <WH5927> that cometh עַ֣ל <WH5921> and לֶב־ <WH3820> heart אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> into any man's לְהָבִ֖יא <WH935> to bring בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

יִקְח֤וּ <WH3947> take לָהֶם֙ הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> Let the priests אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> [it] to them every man מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> מַכָּר֑וֹ <WH4378> of his acquaintance וְהֵ֗ם <WH1992> and they יְחַזְּקוּ֙ <WH2388> and let them repair אֶת־ <WH853> בֶּ֣דֶק <WH919> the breaches הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> of the house לְכֹ֛ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after יִמָּצֵ֥א <WH4672> shall be found שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> any בָּֽדֶק׃ <WH919> wheresoever any breach פ

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <WH8141> year עֶשְׂרִ֧ים <WH6242> and twentieth וְשָׁלֹ֛שׁ <WH7969> three שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> year לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of king יְהוֹאָ֑שׁ <WH3060> Jehoash לֹֽא־ <WH3808> had not חִזְּק֥וּ <WH2388> had not repaired הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> the priests אֶת־ <WH853> בֶּ֥דֶק <WH919> the breaches הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> of the house

וַיִּקְרָא֩ <WH7121> called הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> Then king יְהוֹאָ֜שׁ <WH3060> Jehoash לִיהוֹיָדָ֤ע <WH3077> for Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> the priest וְלַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> and the [other] priests וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> to מַדּ֛וּעַ <WH4069> Why אֵינְכֶ֥ם <WH369> not מְחַזְּקִ֖ים <WH2388> unto them Why repair אֶת־ <WH853> בֶּ֣דֶק <WH919> ye not the breaches הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> of the house וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> henceforth אַל־ <WH408> no תִּקְחוּ־ <WH3947> take כֶ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> no [more] money מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> מַכָּֽרֵיכֶ֔ם <WH4378> of your acquaintance כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לְבֶ֥דֶק <WH919> it for the breaches הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the house תִּתְּנֻֽהוּ׃ <WH5414> but deliver

וַיֵּאֹ֖תוּ <WH225> consented הַכֹּֽהֲנִ֑ים <WH3548> And the priests לְבִלְתִּ֤י <WH1115> no קְחַת־ <WH3947> to receive כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> [more] money מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people וּלְבִלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> neither חַזֵּ֖ק <WH2388> to repair אֶת־ <WH853> בֶּ֥דֶק <WH919> the breaches הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> of the house

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> took יְהוֹיָדָ֤ע <WH3077> But Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> the priest אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> chest אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> a וַיִּקֹּ֥ב <WH5344> and bored חֹ֖ר <WH2356> a hole בְּדַלְתּ֑וֹ <WH1817> in the lid וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> of it and set אֹתוֹ֩ <WH853> אֵ֨צֶל <WH681> it beside הַמִּזְבֵּ֜חַ <WH4196> the altar [בַּיָּמִין כ] (מִיָּמִ֗ין <WH3225> left-handed ק) בְּבֽוֹא־ <WH935> cometh אִישׁ֙ <WH376> as one בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> into the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְנָֽתְנוּ־ <WH5414> put שָׁ֤מָּה <WH8033> in it הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> and the priests שֹׁמְרֵ֣י <WH8104> that kept הַסַּ֔ף <WH5592> the door אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> therein all the money הַמּוּבָ֥א <WH935> [that was] brought בֵית־ <WH1004> into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become כִּרְאוֹתָ֔ם <WH7200> And it was [so] when they saw כִּֽי־ <WH3588> there was רַ֥ב <WH7227> that [there was] much הַכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> money בָּֽאָר֑וֹן <WH727> in the chest וַיַּ֨עַל <WH5927> came up סֹפֵ֤ר <WH5608> scribe הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> that the king's וְהַכֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> priest הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> and the high וַיָּצֻ֙רוּ֙ <WH6696> and they put up in bags וַיִּמְנ֔וּ <WH4487> and told אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> the money הַנִּמְצָ֥א <WH4672> that was found בֵית־ <WH1004> in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְנָתְנוּ֙ <WH5414> And they gave אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> the money הַֽמְתֻכָּ֔ן <WH8505> being told עַל־ <WH5921> and [יַד כ] (יְדֵי֙ <WH3027> able ק) עֹשֵׂ֣י <WH6213> of them that did הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> the work [הַפְּקֻדִים כ] (הַמֻּפְקָדִ֖ים <WH6485> appoint ק) בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיּוֹצִיאֻ֜הוּ <WH3318> and they laid it out לְחָרָשֵׁ֤י <WH2796> artificer הָעֵץ֙ <WH6086> carpenter וְלַבֹּנִ֔ים <WH1129> and builders הָעֹשִׂ֖ים <WH6213> that wrought בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> upon the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְלַגֹּֽדְרִים֙ <WH1443> And to masons וּלְחֹצְבֵ֣י <WH2672> and hewers הָאֶ֔בֶן <WH68> of stone וְלִקְנ֤וֹת <WH7069> and to buy עֵצִים֙ <WH6086> timber וְאַבְנֵ֣י <WH68> stone מַחְצֵ֔ב <WH4274> and hewed לְחַזֵּ֖ק <WH2388> to repair אֶת־ <WH853> בֶּ֣דֶק <WH919> the breaches בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּלְכֹ֛ל <WH3605> and for all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that was יֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> and for all that was laid out עַל־ <WH5921> out הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> for the house לְחָזְקָֽה׃ <WH2394> to repair

אַךְ֩ <WH389> also לֹ֨א <WH3808> were not יֵעָשֶׂ֜ה <WH6213> Howbeit there were not made בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> for the house יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD סִפּ֥וֹת <WH5592> bowls כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> of silver מְזַמְּר֤וֹת <WH4212> snuffers מִזְרָקוֹת֙ <WH4219> basons חֲצֹ֣צְר֔וֹת <WH2689> trumpets כָּל־ <WH3605> any כְּלִ֥י <WH3627> any vessels זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> of gold וּכְלִי־ <WH3627> or vessels כָ֑סֶף <WH3701> of silver מִן־ <WH4480> from הַכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> of the money הַמּוּבָ֥א <WH935> [that was] brought בֵית־ <WH1004> into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לְעֹשֵׂ֥י <WH6213> did הַמְּלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> the work יִתְּנֻ֑הוּ <WH5414> But they gave וְחִזְּקוּ־ <WH2388> and repaired ב֖וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> therewith the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְלֹ֧א <WH3808> did not יְחַשְּׁב֣וּ <WH2803> Moreover they reckoned אֶת־ <WH854> with הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH582> not with the men אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whose יִתְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> they delivered אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> the money עַל־ <WH5921> and יָדָ֔ם <WH3027> into whose hand לָתֵ֖ת <WH5414> to be bestowed לְעֹשֵׂ֣י <WH6213> for they dealt הַמְּלָאכָ֑ה <WH4399> on workmen כִּ֥י <WH3588> for בֶאֱמֻנָ֖ה <WH530> faithfully הֵ֥ם <WH1992> they עֹשִֽׂים׃ <WH6213> dealt

כֶּ֤סֶף <WH3701> money אָשָׁם֙ <WH817> The trespass וְכֶ֣סֶף <WH3701> money חַטָּא֔וֹת <WH2399> fault לֹ֥א <WH3808> was not יוּבָ֖א <WH935> was not brought בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> into the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD לַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> it was the priests' יִהְיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> become פ

אָ֣ז <WH227> Then יַעֲלֶ֗ה <WH5927> went up חֲזָאֵל֙ <WH2371> Then Hazael מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> of Syria וַיִּלָּ֥חֶם <WH3898> and fought עַל־ <WH5921> against גַּ֖ת <WH1661> against Gath וַֽיִּלְכְּדָ֑הּ <WH3920> and took וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <WH7760> set חֲזָאֵל֙ <WH2371> it and Hazael פָּנָ֔יו <WH6440> his face לַעֲל֖וֹת <WH5927> to go up עַל־ <WH5921> against יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> to Jerusalem

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> took יְהוֹאָ֣שׁ <WH3060> And Jehoash מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַקֳּדָשִׁ֡ים <WH6944> all the hallowed things אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after הִקְדִּ֣ישׁוּ <WH6942> had dedicated יְהוֹשָׁפָ֣ט <WH3092> that Jehoshaphat וִיהוֹרָם֩ <WH3088> and Jehoram וַאֲחַזְיָ֨הוּ <WH274> and Ahaziah אֲבֹתָ֜יו <WH1> his fathers מַלְכֵ֤י <WH4428> kings יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah וְאֶת־ <WH853> קֳדָשָׁ֔יו <WH6944> and his own hallowed things וְאֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַזָּהָ֗ב <WH2091> and all the gold הַנִּמְצָ֛א <WH4672> [that was] found בְּאֹצְר֥וֹת <WH214> in the treasures בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> and in the king's וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <WH7971> and sent לַֽחֲזָאֵל֙ <WH2371> [it] to Hazael מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> of Syria וַיַּ֖עַל <WH5927> and he went away מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> from יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> from Jerusalem

וְיֶ֛תֶר <WH3499> And the rest דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts יוֹאָ֖שׁ <WH3101> of Joash וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> and all that he did הֲלוֹא־ <WH3808> not הֵ֣ם <WH1992> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <WH3789> [are] they not written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֛פֶר <WH5612> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> of the kings יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> Judah

וַיָּקֻ֥מוּ <WH6965> arose עֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> And his servants וַיִּקְשְׁרֽוּ־ <WH7194> and made קָ֑שֶׁר <WH7195> a conspiracy וַיַּכּוּ֙ <WH5221> and slew אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹאָ֔שׁ <WH3101> Joash בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> in the house מִלֹּ֖א <WH4407> of Millo הַיּוֹרֵ֥ד <WH3381> which goeth down סִלָּֽא׃ <WH5538> to Silla

וְיוֹזָבָ֣ד <WH3107> Josabad בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שִׁ֠מְעָת <WH8100> of Shimeath וִיהוֹזָבָ֨ד <WH3075> and Jehozabad בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שֹׁמֵ֤ר ׀ <WH7763> of Shomer עֲבָדָיו֙ <WH5650> his servants הִכֻּ֣הוּ <WH5221> smote וַיָּמֹ֔ת <WH4191> him and he died וַיִּקְבְּר֥וּ <WH6912> and they buried אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֖יו <WH1> him with his fathers בְּעִ֣יר <WH5892> in the city דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned אֲמַצְיָ֥ה <WH558> and Amaziah בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place פ
